#summary Configuration options for simplejpa.properties
#labels Phase-Implementation,Manual

= Introduction =

This page has all the available options in simplejpa.properties

= Config Options =

|| *Property* || *required?* || *default* || *description* ||
|| accessKey = YOUR_AWS_ACCESS_KEY || required ||
|| secretKey = YOUR_AWS_SECRET_KEY || required ||
|| printQueries = true/false || optional || false || If true, all amazon queries will be printed to System.out ||
|| cacheFactory = com.spaceprogram.simplejpa.cache.EhCacheFactory || optional || no caching || Cache factory for SecondLevelCache ||
|| net.sf.ehcache.configurationResourceName = /ehcache-test.xml || required if cacheFactory is used || ehcache.xml || configuration file for ehcache ||
|| sessionless = true/false || optional || true || If true, enable [Sessionless] mode ||
|| threads = 100 || optional || 100 || Set the number of threads SimpleJPA will use ||
